metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9826 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The fulltext search component in phpBB before 3.2.6 allows Denial of Service. It was discovered that phpBB has a XSS vulnerability. An attacker could possibly use this do cause a Denial of Service or execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: phpbb3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
